verses.roman:
prathamei kāśī-miśre prabhu bolāila
paḍichā-pātra, sārvabhaume bolāñā ānila

synonyms: prathamei—in the beginning; kāśī-miśre—Kāśī Miśra; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; bolāila—called for; paḍichā-pātra—the superintendent of the temple; sārvabhaume—Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya; bolāñā—calling; ānila—brought.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu first of all called for Kāśī Miśra, then for the superintendent of the temple, then for Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya.
